title: Exponential approximation and meromorphic interpolation
authors: Yurii Belov, Alexander Borichev, Alexander Kuznetsov
abstract:
We establish a relation between the approximation in $L^2[-\pi,\pi]$ by
exponentials with the set of frequencies of density less than $1$ and the
meromorphic interpolation at $\mathbb Z$. Furthermore, we show that typical
$L^2[-\pi,\pi]$ functions admit such an approximation.
